content: पातंजल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Composed by Patañjali; पातंजले महाभाष्ये कृतभूरिपरिश्रमः <ls>Paribhāṣenduśekhara</ls>. --लं The Yoga system of philosophy taught by Patañjali. (It is generally believed that Patañjali, the author of the Mahābhāṣya, is the same as the author of the Yoga system: but it is a dubious point).
